post:
[Our Agency's Website](https://alimemaj.com)  
We provide custom Website Designs for individuals or businesses who want their website to have a modern and professional look. Our templates are all designed by code, no software used. Every design/template is unique / modern / professional / responsive and most of all full white-label. [No "design by" tag or such anywhere in the template] Nobody will know it was us that designed it.  
  
  
**Is a web design so important?:**  
If your business / brand is mostly web-based, absolutely. Web Design is very important and has a very big impact in the engagement of your clients / visitors.  
  
  
**General Pricing**  
Although Web Design pricing depends on the client's specifications and preferations mostly and has no standart pricing, we have a few ground pricing.  
  
**Custom Landing page** - Starting from 70$.  
**Custom Full Website Design + Logo that fits the design** -  Starting from 300$.  
**Custom Full Website Design + WHMCS Integration[Hosting businesses] + Logo** - Starting from 500$.  
  
  
**Showcase / clients / how we work**  
The website already contains alot of information. Although if you would like to see a few of our works [free ones] we have released to public to get an idea of our work. [Click here](https://alimemaj.com/promotion.php)  
  
  
**More info:**  
We provide full support to the client after delivery through email / skype / whatsapp and free setup if needed. Templates can be designed in HTML or PHP, as the client desires. The difference? In PHP the template is easier to edit and saves more time[menu,footer..etc].  
  
  
**[Get a Quote](https://alimemaj.com/get-in-touch.php)** or drop me a PM.  
  
P.S: Approved by Staff.
